lines.text: I'm an actor, Frank! All I want to do is act in movies, and cheat on my wife. Is that too much to ask?
How tall are you, Peter?
About six foot one.
Don't cut yourself off at the knees.
There's a reason why we're all here tonight...
You threatened us.
[laughter]
Did he threaten you too Sammy?
Um, I refuse to answer that on the grounds that it might incinerate me baby.
If power doesn't mean that you have the opportunity to work with the people that you love , then you haven't really got any.

[to Mia Farrow]
You walk out that door baby, you walk out of my life!
Hey, did we kill tonight or what?
[Dean does not reply]
We killed tonight. I haven't laughed like that...
...since I played a little club in Poughkeepse back in 1944.
What're you saying, we weren't funny tonight?
What I'm saying is erm... watch this.
[to two women]
Scuse me ladies
[he babbles, and they laugh]
Yeah, so?

So, the world is drunk and we're just the cocktail of the moment pally. One of these days everybody's gonna wake up with a heck of a hangover, down two aspirin and a glass of tomato juice and wonder what the hell all the fuss was about.
Hey Frank, how do you make a fruit cordial?
I don't know Dean, how do you make a fruit cordial?
Be nice to it.
